```{r include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(shiny)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, cache = FALSE)
datasets <- shiny_data$datasets
```

## Individual meta-analyses

For more information on phonemic discrimination and word segmentation MAs, please see the relevant tabs. 

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}
for (i in 1:nrow(datasets)) {
  dataset <- datasets[i,]
  cat(sprintf("### %s \n * [%s](%s) \n * N papers = %s, N effect sizes = %s \n * %s \n\n",
              dataset$name, dataset$citation, dataset$link, dataset$num_papers, dataset$num_experiments, dataset$description))
}
```
